verses.verse: Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>"Speak<s%> to the <S%H3548>priests,<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> and <S%H559>say<s%> to them, <S%H3808>'No<s%> one shall <S%H2930>defile<s%> himself for a [dead] <S%H5315>person<s%> among his <S%H9415>people,<s%>

<S%H3588>except<s%> <S%H518><s%> for his <S%H7607>relatives<s%> who are <S%H7138>nearest<s%> to him, his <S%H517>mother<s%> and his father and his <S%H1>son<s%> and his <S%H1121>daughter<s%> and his <S%H1323>brother,<s%>

also for his <S%H1330>virgin<s%> <S%H269>sister,<s%> who is <S%H7138>near<s%> to him <S%H834>because<s%> she <S%H1961>has<s%> <S%H1961>had<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H376>husband;<s%> for her he may <S%H2930>defile<s%> himself.
'He shall not <S%H2930>defile<s%> himself as a <S%H1167>relative<s%> by <S%H1167>marriage<s%> among his <S%H9415>people,<s%> and so <S%H2490>profane<s%> himself.

'They shall not <S%H7139>make<s%> any <S%H7139>baldness<s%> <S%H7144><s%> on their <S%H7218>heads,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H1548>shave<s%> <S%H1548>off<s%> the <S%H6285>edges<s%> of their <S%H2206>beards,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H8295>make<s%> any <S%H8295>cuts<s%> in their <S%H1320>flesh.<s%>

'They shall be <S%H6918>holy<s%> to their <S%H430>God<s%> and not <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H8034>name<s%> of their <S%H430>God,<s%> for they <S%H7126>present<s%> the <S%H801>offerings<s%> by <S%H801>fire<s%> to the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of their <S%H430>God;<s%> so they shall be <S%H6944>holy.<s%>

'They shall not <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> who is <S%H9137>profaned<s%> by <S%H2181>harlotry,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> shall they <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>woman<s%> <S%H1644>divorced<s%> from her <S%H376>husband;<s%> for he is <S%H6918>holy<s%> to his <S%H430>God.<s%>

'You shall <S%H6942>consecrate<s%> him, therefore, for he <S%H7126>offers<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of your <S%H430>God;<s%> he shall be <S%H6918>holy<s%> to you; for I the <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> who <S%H6942>sanctifies<s%> you, am <S%H6918>holy.<s%>

'Also the <S%H1323>daughter<s%> of <S%H376>any<s%> <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H3588>if<s%> she <S%H2490>profanes<s%> herself by <S%H2181>harlotry,<s%> she <S%H2490>profanes<s%> her father; she shall be <S%H1>burned<s%> with <S%H8313>fire.<s%>

'And the <S%H3548>priest<s%> who is the <S%H1419>highest<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> his <S%H251>brothers,<s%> on <S%H834>whose<s%> <S%H7218>head<s%> the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> has been <S%H3332>poured,<s%> and who has been <S%H4390>consecrated<s%> <S%H3027><s%> to <S%H3847>wear<s%> the <S%H899>garments,<s%> shall not <S%H6544>uncover<s%> his <S%H7218>head,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H6533>tear<s%> his <S%H899>clothes;<s%>
<S%H3808>nor<s%> shall he <S%H935>approach<s%> <S%H3605>any<s%> <S%H4191>dead<s%> <S%H5315>person,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2930>defile<s%> himself [even] for his father or his <S%H1>mother;<s%>

<S%H3808>nor<s%> shall he <S%H3318>go<s%> out of the <S%H4720>sanctuary,<s%> <S%H3808>nor<s%> <S%H2490>profane<s%> the <S%H4720>sanctuary<s%> of his <S%H430>God;<s%> for the <S%H5145>consecration<s%> of the <S%H4888>anointing<s%> <S%H8081>oil<s%> of his <S%H430>God<s%> is on him: I am the <S%H3068>Lord.<s%>
'And he shall <S%H3947>take<s%> a <S%H802>wife<s%> in her <S%H1331>virginity.<s%>

'A <S%H490>widow,<s%> or a <S%H1644>divorced<s%> woman, or one who is <S%H9137>profaned<s%> by <S%H2181>harlotry,<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> he may not <S%H3947>take;<s%> but <S%H3588>rather<s%> <S%H518><s%> he is to <S%H3947>marry<s%> a <S%H1330>virgin<s%> of his own <S%H9415>people;<s%>
that he may not <S%H2490>profane<s%> his <S%H2233>offspring<s%> among his <S%H9415>people:<s%> for I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> who <S%H6942>sanctifies<s%> him.' "
Then the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H1696>"Speak<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3808>'No<s%> <S%H376>man<s%> of your <S%H2233>offspring<s%> throughout their <S%H1755>generations<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1961>has<s%> a <S%H9249>defect<s%> shall <S%H7126>approach<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of his <S%H430>God.<s%>

'For <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H376>one<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has a <S%H9249>defect<s%> shall <S%H7126>approach:<s%> a <S%H5787>blind<s%> <S%H376>man,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H6455>lame<s%> <S%H6455>man,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> he who has a <S%H9171>disfigured<s%> [face], <S%H176>or<s%> any <S%H8311>deformed<s%> [limb],
<S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H1961>has<s%> a <S%H7667>broken<s%> <S%H7272>foot<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H7667>broken<s%> <S%H3027>hand,<s%>

<S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H1384>hunchback<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> a <S%H1851>dwarf,<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> [one who has] a <S%H8400>defect<s%> in his <S%H5869>eye<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H1618>eczema<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H3217>scabs<s%> <S%H176>or<s%> <S%H4790>crushed<s%> <S%H810>testicles.<s%>

<S%H3808>'No<s%> <S%H3605><s%> <S%H376>man<s%> <S%H4480>among<s%> the <S%H2233>descendants<s%> of <S%H175>Aaron<s%> the <S%H3548>priest,<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> has a <S%H9249>defect,<s%> is to <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> the Lord's <S%H801>offerings<s%> by <S%H801>fire;<s%> [since] he has a <S%H9249>defect,<s%> he shall not <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> to <S%H7126>offer<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of his <S%H430>God.<s%>
'He may <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H3899>bread<s%> of his <S%H430>God,<s%> [both] of the <S%H6944>most<s%> <S%H6944>holy<s%> and of the <S%H6944>holy,<s%>

<S%H389>only<s%> he shall not <S%H935>go<s%> in to the <S%H6532>veil<s%> or <S%H5066>come<s%> <S%H5066>near<s%> the <S%H4196>altar<s%> <S%H3588>because<s%> he has a <S%H9249>defect,<s%> that he may not <S%H2490>profane<s%> My <S%H4720>sanctuaries.<s%> For I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> who <S%H6942>sanctifies<s%> them.' "
So <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and to his <S%H1121>sons<s%> and to <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1121>sons<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
